评论概述: Great for you barefooted people out there.
评论详情: They definitely feel like you are working barefoot.

I can feel my feet and drive again!! These shoes have given me back my independence. If you don't believe me, try them. If it doesn't help, return them. My feet are wide and swell a lot. They are roomy but I still sized up 1 size and they're perfect!!
Great on my feet for sure!

OK, so honest review I have problem feet. I’ve had surgery three times on the top part of my foot and I’ve had plantar fasciitis in the past so needless to say finding shoes that are comfortable all day at work is impossible so I wear Javianna flip-flops year-round but the weather is getting cold. The doctor keeps telling me that I need to wear shoes but my feet hate shoes. They just hate them. So I purchased these and receive them and I almost returned them because they’re not very attractive, but I walked in my house in them and they feel like I’m wearing flip-flops, but with a little bit more support and warmer so today I wore them to work. I’ve been in them all day and my feet feel awesome, which is not normally the case in any other tennis shoe, I can wear for four hours even high-end tennis shoes Four hours is max but these I’ve had all day so my review is on comfort. They are excellent if you have problem feet I hope this helps.
Size was perfect and love comfort!

So excited to have these shoes. They are light weight and fit just right. I have wide feet and most shoes don’t fit right. But these shoes fit wonderfully. No pinching of toes, instead they are wide and breathable. They seem so durable and stylish. I’m so excited to have these shoes for hiking and daily use. May get a few more in different colors.
The pair I bought was at least 1 size smaller than the listed size.
I like them
Nice durable for walking ability flexibile and they fit great

I  RECEVIED MY SHOES YESTERDAY.  I am a size 10.5 and ordered 11.5.  The fit is perfect.  There is a small label that says 44, which is my european size.  They are quite comfortable.  My bare feet are pleasantly warm.
I like them but just saying my feet have problems and so far able to not have pinched toes,like walking in crocs
WOW these shoes are amazing.

I was experiencing foot pad issues.  I first used the cushiony sandals. I loved bouncing around in them as it signaled to me that I could walk as much as I wanted.  But eventually they would get too big and a little dangerous on stairs, so I decided to upgrade to Nike running shoes for hard surfaces.  Loved these Lucy shoes.  But I realized I was only fine if I never walked barefoot.  This was not practical and hobbling out of bed in the morning was not cool.  So, I tried these barefoot shows along with a regime of pedicures, Ceraphil, and vitamin C.  Now, these are my favorite shoes, and I have happy, healthy feet.One tip… I had to use foot powder in them as I was barefoot in the barefoot shoes.  Surprisingly, after a few times of applying powder, my feet stay dry and odor free!Plus, it’s fun to wear them with maxi skirts for the ultimate essentric and comfort So I don’t care look.So, I am really happy with these shoes.  And I am even happier with the fact that I can walk barefoot all day long!

Loved the fit and comfort of the shoe.  I'm not a fan of the elastic laces, but had planned to just replace them.  The reason I returned these is the awful color!  They are half beige and half light lime green.  Yuck.  If I would have known they weren't completely beige as pictured, I would not have ordered.
Que puedo decir sobre esto shoes  son lo mas comodos que puedo usar lo unico que lamento es que no compre mas de ellos cuando estaban en sale por $28 .00 ahora estan a $36.00
This is my second time trying these type of shoes. I love it. Lightweight, yet bottom of shoes good for walking. Will purchase again

Great design, comfort, weight, feel and sizing. Ordering the same pair as I type. More and more of my coworkers are asking about them and some have already purchased some. Grip, feel, lightweight, appearance, flexibility, cost

I was enthusiastic to get barefoot shoes. I have neuropathy with a couple big neuromas. I put the shoe on and length was perfect, but the width was less than most shoes I normally get 1 size bigger.  So, sadly they are returned. You really never know what you'll get when you order from this origin.
So far so good.  I've worn them all day today, even to grocery store.  I was concerned about a lack of support but they're quite comfy.

I got a 10.5 women’s and it fits more like a 9.5. Ordered a half size up and hope it fits better. Still very comfy and very grippy, I use these for CrossFit and they’re great!
It is my first experience with this type of shoes. Need a few walks to adapt but not a big deal.
Good price and comfortable however the inner sole is flimsily so not sure how long it would last

Overall the shoe looks great and feels very nice but I took the (bad) advice of the top review and wound up with a much bigger shoe than necessary. I’m typically a size 10 or 10.5 but was encouraged to go a size or two up… big mistake.  These are accurate to American sizing and actually run a bit large by euro standards (11.5 is actually more like a 45 instead of 44). 11.5 turns out to be exactly 28cm of inside foot space, which is 2 cm too many for my feet.  I’m returning and getting the correct size 10 which should measure to just under 27cm. I will update my review when they arrive.
I’ve had these shoes for about 3 days now and they’re comfortable. I will be getting another pair
My main goal was to wear as slippers / walk around with support shoes.  They fit the bill. When my feet are swollen, I  wear these shoes for support. Enjoy.

For myself, they are stretchable, lightweight, need a little more insole for arch support.

I’ve been looking into these types of shoes for a while and finally bought them when I saw the good price. They are very comfortable and my toes have a lot of room. The material is breathable as well which is nice. They have very little bounce to them, but it’s not like being barefoot. It’s more like they fit my feet well, like house slippers that fit my foot. Highly recommend.

These are the most comfortable shoe I’ve ever worn. I have a neuroma on my foot and can’t wear lace up shoes or sneakers. I’m able to wear these for hours without pain. Not pretty but it’s worth the trade off. Can’t believe how inexpensive they are.

评论概述: Holes under my toes in four months.
评论详情: I love the feel of these shoes. They fit well. Plenty of cushion in the soles. Unfortunately, after four months, I am searching for a new pair of shoes because they have developed holes on the bottom outside of the toe box. I used these for running at the park on a paved trail and off trail. Super disappointed that they did not last longer. On the plus side I patched it up with some duct tape and it’s holding for now.
Nice shoe,fits perfectly to my size 10. Look nice will see the durability with some use and reval later. Good price too

A really good shoe gives adequate support. I added support cushion from dr scholls for additional support.. but extremely comfy and roomy for bunions feels like walking barefoot now can walk for miles

评论概述: Feels like swimming wet shoes, nothing special!!
评论详情: Honestly, very disappointing. Feels like an excuse to rebrand 90s swimming wet shoe as something fancy, And it has NO traction for wet or icy surfaces!!! Can't hold up to being warn for longer than 6 hours before your body hates you, specifically your feet.  Don't waste your money and save your feet from the pain!!
Tried on immediately. My toes were jammed at the top. If you can, order 1/2 size up Shoes overall seem cheaply made. Not much cushion. Returned them. Still looking for a good pair
Comfortable, slip on and off easy.  Washable, great indoors or out.  Protect feet. Good value.

I was looking for zero drop shoes. These shoes fit the bill. Extremely skid-resistant. Comfy fit because they allow my feet to rest naturally without being cramped or formed into an unnatural shape. I love the elastic ties…pull them to fit, slide the retainer clip down to lock it to fit. Except when I put on the first shoe, the clip flew off. I couldn’t figure how to reattach it so I tied the laces and got the same affect. No problem with the second shoe. I figured it wasn’t a big enough deal to send them back. I have limited range in one hip and have to use a shoe horn to put the shoe on and the back of the shoe works great for that. I haven’t had any problems with them so far (more than a week) and the zero drop sole plus the wider toe box makes my feet and legs feel like I’m barefoot, and also helps my hip line up better than regular shoes. I’m very happy with them. Just be sure to understand the bottoms are VERY slip resistant. I have barked them several times but that may be because they’re very new. I can learn to deal with that more than worrying about having them slip and slide. Will I buy more? Probably. They’re that good.

My forth pair of this style shoe (barefoot) in two years,this was to be my work pair but I decided that I like them much better then my home pair that I wear these everywhere.They fit better and much cooler looking and the bare shoe sole (I don't wear the inserts) feel so much better with the rougher texture it wakes up my nerve endings and my feet just love them! Thank you,John.
Comfortable wide toe box. Easy slip on.
The fit quite nicely. Definitely wpuld recommend.

My feet were so sore from a lot of Christmas shopping, I honestly didn’t know how I was going to be able to finish it.  A friend highly recommended these to me & promised me I would feel a difference immediately! I can honestly say, she was right! It was the best purchase I have ever made! I wish I could give these shoes a 10 star rating!!!

They are not as wide as I would like because I have very wide feet. That being said they are amazing feeling shoes. They slip on and stay on. They have good support for my feet and are light weight. They stretch well which is good for my wide feet.  The grip on them is crazy rugged there is no slipping in these bad boys. Perfect for water shoes or trail shoes. They are my gym, yard and everything slip on shoes I will for sure but these again.

These are surprisingly comfortable, I’ve been walking my dogs for several miles using them, and my feet don’t hurt. Be aware that they are quite cold, not only is the bottom quite thin and will pick up cold ground, but the material is ventilated. Not a winter shoe for sure.  Also, because they are ventilated if you’re walking through any kind of loose ground or sand, your shoes will fill up with dirt. Otherwise, I’m quite happy with them and I think they’re helping to strengthen my feet.
